cancelAuctionWhenPaused(uint256).details: Cancels an auction when the contract is paused.  Only the owner may do this, and NFTs are returned to  the seller. This should only be used in emergencies.

params._tokenId: - ID of the NFT on auction to cancel.

getAuction(uint256).details: Returns auction info for an NFT on auction.

getCurrentPrice(uint256).details: Returns the current price of an auction.

params._tokenId: - ID of the token price we are checking.
